# spatialStereoImmersive

**Type Property**

Displays the image’s spatial stereo representation (if available) with an immersive presentation style.

## Declaration

```swift
static let spatialStereoImmersive: ImagePresentationComponent.ViewingMode
```

## Stereoscopic presentation of spatial photos

- **spatialStereo**: Displays the image’s spatial stereo representation (if available) with a windowed presentation style.
